Quick environment self-test

mccourse_self_test.Rd

Checks that installed templates are discoverable and reports available weeks. Returns TRUE invisibly on success.

Usage

mccourse_self_test()

mccourse_self_test()

Value

TRUE (invisibly) if templates are discoverable; otherwise, an error.

Examples

# \donttest{
mccourse_self_test()
#> Error: No installed templates found under inst/courses in this package.
# }
